args.text:
Interesting facts about Subway Surfers game:

- Subway Surfers is the most downloaded game of all time on Google Play.
- The game was created by Kiloo and SYBO Games.
- The original Subway Surfers game was launched in 2012.
- The game is set in a fictional world called the Subway.
- The game has been downloaded over 2 billion times worldwide.
- The game has been translated into 27 different languages.
- The main characters in the game are Jake, Tricky, and Fresh.
- The game has won numerous awards, including the Kids' Choice Award for Favorite App in 2018.
